The Ideal--Finally Cease to Deal Out Drugs.-- When you understand physiology in its truest sense, your drug bills will be very much smaller, and finally you will 
                                                                           284
cease to deal out drugs at all. The physician who depends upon drug medication in his practice, shows that he does not understand the delicate machinery of the human organism. He is introducing into the system a seed crop that will never lose its destroying properties throughout the lifetime. I tell you this because I dare not withhold it. Christ paid too much for man's redemption to have his body so ruthlessly treated as it has been by drug medication.
